data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kaliningrad do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaliningrad, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 528,672 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.section_summary: On average, 64 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Kaliningrad, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kaliningrad, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 13,784 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Altai people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Altai people know you.
Spirit, please give every church in the state of Kaliningrad a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, encourage the 13,784 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Kaliningrad words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Kaliningrad
location.people_groups_list: Andalal, Nanai, Hezhen, Lezgin, Yukagir, Alutor
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Andalal (62,000), Nanai, Hezhen (4,900), Lezgin (195,000), Yukagir (1,600), Alutor (2,000)
